Entries.Mon2: It's weird what people leave lying around. I dunno what most of it's for, but... do you like my collection?
Entries.Mon6: Sometimes I dream of the sky. How high do you think it goes, friend?
Entries.Mon10: My people are gone. Lost. What if I'm the last?
Entries.Tue2: Finest bombs this side of the Cascade Mountains. Make all the rocks go boom!
Entries.Tue6: My sires told stories of the shadowfolk. Scary stories that kept us awake at night.#$b#I can feel them here, deep in the mines. Broken, lost, and filled with anger.
Entries.Tue8: We didn't mean to hurt the shadowfolk and blow open their home.#$b#It was an accident! A terrible, horrible accident.
Entries.Tue10: Do you think the shadow-person in the stinky-underdark gets lonely too?#$b#He didn't seem angry like the other ones, the ones below.
Entries.Wed2: Pretty dangerous place, these mines. You gonna need some supplies. I've got bombs, and I've got lollipops. Best kind. Candied cave carrot!
Entries.Wed8: I find things in the mines that make me think of my people. It makes me sad.#$b#Where are my kin, friend?
Entries.Thu6: My sibling fell in love with the sky. They went out in the day to see the sun.#$b#It burned their eyes blind. Your sun is our enemy and cannot be trusted.
Entries.Thu8: Sometimes at night I wander through town. Humans have the weirdest stuff.#$b#And they just leave it lying around like it doesn't matter to them.
Entries.Thu10: The human with the silly hat keeps watch. I don't think he trusts me.#$b#You trust me, don't you friend?
Entries.Fri2: My sire taught me bombcraft. Do you know the tricks?#$b#Ah, but why make them yourself, when you can buy them from me!
Entries.Fri6: I had a name, but I hid it so no-one could hurt me.#$b#Names are powerful, friend, be careful who you trust with yours.
Entries.Fri10: I'll tell you a secret, friend. I made this shop for you. Who else is gonna buy my stuff?
Entries.Sat4: The mines can be treacherous. Be careful, friend.#$b#My wares will help you stay alive.
Entries.Sat8: I came from mountains far away. Escaped from... No, you don't need to hear my sad story!#$b#The valley called me home. The end.
Entries.Sat10: The Elemental Wars were terrible. My sires told stories about the carnage.#$b#They made sure I remember.
Entries.Sun8: That human with the wire-frame eyes, I watch her stare at the stars.#$b#It makes me think of home. Sire said that we came from the stars.
Entries.Sun10: You're a good friend. I'm glad I trusted you.
Entries.JasperHome1: I hope your friend's okay. But please keep our secret.#$b#Humans fear what they don't understand and destroy what they fear.
Entries.JasperHomeA: Thanks for keeping me secret, friend. Maybe one day I'll talk to your friend... but I've gotta decide if he can be trusted first. Okay?
